description: Styles for Card component in a web application, defining various visual properties for classes related to the card layout.

classes.name: card
classes.description: Main card container style, includes properties for background, color, border, shadow, padding, and layout.

classes.name: default
classes.description: Style applied to cards with default elevation and shadow effect.

classes.name: elevated
classes.description: Style applied to cards to give a higher elevation with more pronounced shadow effects.

classes.name: header
classes.description: Styling for the header section of the card, including font size, weight, color, and alignment.

classes.name: body
classes.description: Styling for the body section of the card, sets layout and alignment.
